author: Matthew Mulligan
title: Britain claps for health care workers in mass applause
description: Political leaders, celebrities and members of the royal family joined in a nationwide tribute to doctors, nurses, and others health workers.
content:
People across the U.K. gathered on their doorsteps and balconies on Thursday night to show their appreciation to the countrys health workers.
From apartment blocks to 10 Downing Street, well-wishers paid tribute to all the staff in the National Health Servic… [+5310 chars]
